options.content:
# !!! DO NOT MAKE CHANGES !!!

If you need a panel from this dashboard - feel free to copy a panel to a different dashboard. If you need to change this dashboard, please duplicate this dashboard into your own first.

## How to duplicate dashboard

1. Click the settings on top tight of this dashboard
2. Click "save as" on top right of this dashboard
3. Change name (and directory, if desired)
4. Click save.

targets.expr:
(
  sum by(service_id) (increase(path_requests_total{namespace=~"middleware", request_type="REQUEST_TYPE_ORGANIC", service=~"path-shannon-mainnet-metrics"}[1m]))
  /
  (
    sum by(service_id) (increase(path_requests_total{namespace=~"middleware", request_type="REQUEST_TYPE_ORGANIC", service=~"path-shannon-beta-metrics|path-shannon-metrics"}[1m]))
    +
    sum by(service_id) (increase(path_requests_total{namespace=~"middleware", request_type="REQUEST_TYPE_ORGANIC", service=~"path-shannon-mainnet-metrics"}[1m]))
  )
) * 100

panels.title: Top Chains by Non-2XX Responses: Total Requests

targets.expr:
# Percentage of non-2xx responses out of total requests for each chain
topk(10,
  (
    sum by(chain_id) (
      label_replace(
        sum by(envoy_cluster_name) (
          increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{envoy_cluster_name=~"httproute/middleware/.*", envoy_response_code!~"2.."}[$__range])
        ),
        "chain_id", 
        "$1", 
        "envoy_cluster_name", 
        "httproute/middleware/([^-]+).*"
      )
    )
    /
    sum by(chain_id) (
      label_replace(
        sum by(envoy_cluster_name) (
          increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{envoy_cluster_name=~"httproute/middleware/.*"}[$__range])
        ),
        "chain_id", 
        "$1", 
        "envoy_cluster_name", 
        "httproute/middleware/([^-]+).*"
      )
    )
  ) * 100
)

panels.title: Top Chains by Non-2XX Response Rate (%)
EVM Requests Success Rate: Organic + Synthetic
